title: RetentionPolicy
description: Defines how long security-related data (audit logs, access records, encryption keys) must be retained, archival strategies, and secure deletion procedures. Ensures compliance with regulatory requirements.

destination.description: Storage or forwarding target for retained security data, per NIST SP 800-53 AU-9 Protection of Audit Information.

deletionMethod.description: Secure disposal technique applied when data reaches end of retention period, per NIST SP 800-88 Guidelines for Media Sanitization.
